ygData.msgSnippet: As everyone saw from the concluded poll, Kinger s self-destruction of the base stands. JP, we both agreed to accept whatever the RPG decided, so I will trust

As everyone saw from the concluded poll, Kinger's self-destruction of 
the base stands. JP, we both agreed to accept whatever the RPG 
decided, so I will trust that you now post for your chars, and fairly 
according to damaging factor (which was a fully-featured base 
exploding (more like desintigrating) itself and everything around it 
for a radius of 1 mile).

I think this matter is closed now. Thanx to everyone for voting.
